DOC.brief_title: A Trial Micronutrients Adverse Pregnancy Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: Fetal loss , low birth weight preterm birth major public health problem worldwide , particularly develop country . Birth outcomes also major predictor child health survival infancy beyond . The purpose study examine efficacy multivitamin supplementation fetal loss , low birth weight severe preterm birth healthy ( HIV negative ) woman . We also aim determine whether potentially protective effect multivitamin supplement risk low birth weight preterm birth translate sustain reduction infant mortality .
DOC.criteria: HIV negative 1226 week gestational age screen visit
